revised_title: Secular Changes of the Magnetical System of the Earth and the Variation of the Magnetical Inclination in the Northern Temperate Zone
tldr: Professor Hansteen presents a research on the secular changes of the Earth's magnetic system, focusing on the secular variation of magnetic inclination in the Northern Temperate Zone. He calculates newer and older observations of magnetic declination to determine the movement of the four magnetic polar regions and attempts to explain the cause of known variations in declination, inclination, and intensity.
